amendment.description: To require reporting regarding the costs of conferences held by the Department of Justice.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3215 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3215 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S12706-12707, S12717; text: CR S12706) To require reporting regarding the costs of conferences held by the Department of Justice.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3215 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3215 proposed by Senator Mikulski.
